name: How to Upcycle your Monster
description:
Play as a scientist and his latest creation... a monster made of scrap parts.

Take turns battling against enemies. Turns will go Scientist > Monster > Enemy.

The scientist can buff his monster's attack or defense.

The monster can choose from a few different attacks. You unlock more as the game progresses.

The enemy will attack. After you defeat an enemy it'll drop body parts for you to add on to your monster. Choose between two options and see how it'll affect your monster.

Join this scientist and his creation on this wonderful journey together!
